thread.section_title: AMIClubwear.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMIClubwear.com | www.amiclubwear.com | 23 of 769
thread.title: Tammy

author: Tammy
title: Tammy
text: My package never came in the mail and when I called the customer service line for some help- the girl on the line gave me a very icy tone and I could tell she did not offer ANY solutions although I'm sure they deal with missing packages ALL THE TIME. Poor service, beware of placing an order from here- they will ignore your calls and emails if your package never comes.
